// BLADES OF AVERNUM CORE SCENARIO ITEMS SCRIPT 2
// This is the script containing the core data for BoA scenarios. 
// DO NOT EDIT THIS SCRIPT!
// If you want to make new creatures, floors, terrain types, and items, you can place
// a customized script in your scenario's directory with the new items and modifications
// to old ones.
// Look at the scenarios which came with Blades of Avernum for examples.

// Instructions for editing this file and descriptions of all fields can be found in
// the Blades of Avernum instructions.

beginscendatascript;

// TERRAIN TYPES
// A Blades of Avernum scenario can have up to 512 terrain types.

begindefineterrain 0; // empty terrain. don't put anything here.
	clear;
	te_name = "Empty";
	te_ed_which_sheet = 680;
	te_ed_which_icon = 80;
begindefineterrain 1; // a block of solid blackness
	te_name = "Blackness";
	te_which_sheet = 704;
	te_which_icon = 3;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 680;
	te_ed_which_icon = 43;
	te_full_move_block = 1;
	te_full_look_block = 1;

// begin Type 1 walls
// Walls come in blocks of 4, n, w, s, the e
begindefineterrain 2; // n wall
	clear;
	te_name = "Wall";
	te_which_sheet = 600;
	te_which_icon = 0;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 690;
	te_ed_which_icon = 0;
	te_cutaway_which_sheet = 600;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 2;
	te_icon_offset_x = 18;
	te_icon_offset_y = -12;
	te_move_block_n = 1;
	te_look_block_n = 1;
	te_blocks_view_n = 1;
	te_draw_on_automap = 1;
begindefineterrain 3; // w wall
	te_which_icon = 1;
	te_ed_which_icon = 1;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 3;
	te_icon_offset_x = -18;
	te_icon_offset_y = -12;
	te_move_block_n = 0;
	te_look_block_n = 0;
	te_blocks_view_n = 0;
	te_move_block_w = 1;
	te_look_block_w = 1;
	te_blocks_view_w = 1;
begindefineterrain 4; // s wall
	te_which_icon = 0;
	te_ed_which_icon = 2;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 2;
	te_icon_offset_x = 0;
	te_icon_offset_y = 0;
	te_move_block_s = 1;
	te_look_block_s = 1;
	te_blocks_view_s = 1;
	te_move_block_w = 0;
	te_look_block_w = 0;
	te_blocks_view_w = 0;
begindefineterrain 5; // e wall
	te_which_icon = 1;
	te_ed_which_icon = 3;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 3;
	te_move_block_s = 0;
	te_look_block_s = 0;
	te_blocks_view_s = 0;
	te_move_block_e = 1;
	te_look_block_e = 1;
	te_blocks_view_e = 1;

// These next 4 walls are unusual. The 2-side walls are drawn almost entirely by the game
// code. The icon and cutaway icon information are basically ignored.
begindefineterrain 6; // nw wall
	te_which_icon = 5;
	te_ed_which_icon = 4;
	te_cutaway_which_sheet = -1;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_move_block_n = 1;
	te_look_block_n = 1;
	te_blocks_view_n = 1;
	te_move_block_w = 1;
	te_look_block_w = 1;
	te_blocks_view_w = 1;
begindefineterrain 7; // ws wall
	te_which_icon = 0;
	te_ed_which_icon = 5;
	te_cutaway_which_sheet = -1;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_blocks_view_n = 0;
	te_move_block_s = 1;
	te_look_block_s = 1;
	te_blocks_view_s = 1;
	te_move_block_w = 1;
	te_look_block_w = 1;
	te_blocks_view_w = 1;
begindefineterrain 8; // se wall
	te_ed_which_icon = 6;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_blocks_view_w = 0;
	te_move_block_s = 1;
	te_look_block_s = 1;
	te_blocks_view_s = 1;
	te_move_block_e = 1;
	te_look_block_e = 1;
	te_blocks_view_e = 1;
begindefineterrain 9; // en wall
	te_ed_which_icon = 7;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_blocks_view_s = 0;
	te_move_block_n = 1;
	te_look_block_n = 1;
	te_blocks_view_n = 1;
	te_move_block_e = 1;
	te_look_block_e = 1;
	te_blocks_view_e = 1;

// doors, then open doors
begindefineterrain 10; 
	import = 2;
	te_name = "Door";
	te_default_script = "door";
	te_which_icon = 10;
	te_ed_which_icon = 10;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 14;
	te_swap_terrain = 14;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 11; 
	import = 3;
	te_name = "Door";
	te_default_script = "door";
	te_which_icon = 11;
	te_ed_which_icon = 11;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 15;
	te_swap_terrain = 15;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 12; 
	import = 4;
	te_name = "Door";
	te_default_script = "door";
	te_which_icon = 10;
	te_ed_which_icon = 12;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 14;
	te_swap_terrain = 16;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 13; 
	import = 5;
	te_name = "Door";
	te_default_script = "door";
	te_which_icon = 11;
	te_ed_which_icon = 13;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 15;
	te_swap_terrain = 17;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 14; 
	import = 10;
	te_which_icon = 12;
	te_ed_which_icon = 14;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 16;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 10;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 15; 
	import = 11;
	te_which_icon = 13;
	te_ed_which_icon = 15;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 17;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 11;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 16; 
	import = 12;
	te_which_icon = 12;
	te_ed_which_icon = 16;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 16;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 12;
	te_can_look_at = 1;
begindefineterrain 17; 
	import = 13;
	te_which_icon = 13;
	te_ed_which_icon = 17;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 17;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 13;
	te_can_look_at = 1;

// secret doors. 
begindefineterrain 18; 
	import = 2;
	te_ed_which_icon = 20;
	te_move_block_n = 0;
begindefineterrain 19; 
	import = 3;
	te_ed_which_icon = 21;
	te_move_block_w = 0;
begindefineterrain 20; 
	import = 4;
	te_ed_which_icon = 22;
	te_move_block_s = 0;
begindefineterrain 21; 
	import = 5;
	te_ed_which_icon = 23;
	te_move_block_e = 0;

// windows
begindefineterrain 22; 
	import = 2;
	te_name = "Window";
	te_which_icon = 30;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 34;
	te_ed_which_icon = 24;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;
begindefineterrain 23; 
	import = 3;
	te_name = "Window";
	te_which_icon = 31;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 35;
	te_ed_which_icon = 25;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;
begindefineterrain 24; 
	import = 4;
	te_name = "Window";
	te_which_icon = 30;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 34;
	te_ed_which_icon = 26;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;
begindefineterrain 25; 
	import = 5;
	te_name = "Window";
	te_which_icon = 31;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 35;
	te_ed_which_icon = 27;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;

// closed gate
begindefineterrain 26; 
	import = 2;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 22;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 26;
	te_ed_which_icon = 30;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 30;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;
begindefineterrain 27; 
	import = 3;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 23;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 27;
	te_ed_which_icon = 31;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 31;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;
begindefineterrain 28; 
	import = 4;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 22;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 26;
	te_ed_which_icon = 32;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 32;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;
begindefineterrain 29; 
	import = 5;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 23;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 27;
	te_ed_which_icon = 33;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 33;
	te_beam_hit_type = 1;

// open gate
begindefineterrain 30; 
	import = 2;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 20;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 24;
	te_ed_which_icon = 34;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 26;
begindefineterrain 31; 
	import = 3;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 21;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 25;
	te_ed_which_icon = 35;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 27;
begindefineterrain 32; 
	import = 4;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 20;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 24;
	te_ed_which_icon = 36;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 28;
begindefineterrain 33; 
	import = 5;
	te_name = "Gate";
	te_which_icon = 21;
	te_cutaway_which_icon = 25;
	te_ed_which_icon = 37;
	te_full_look_block = 0;
	te_full_move_block = 0;
	te_swap_terrain = 29;

// crumbly walls
begindefineterrain 34; 
	import = 2;
	te_which_icon = 32;
	te_ed_which_icon = 40;
	te_crumble_type = 1;
	te_terrain_to_crumble_to = 137;
begindefineterrain 35; 
	import = 3;
	te_which_icon = 33;
	te_ed_which_icon = 41;
	te_crumble_type = 1;
	te_terrain_to_crumble_to = 137;
begindefineterrain 36; 
	import = 4;
	te_which_icon = 32;
	te_ed_which_icon = 42;
	te_crumble_type = 1;
	te_terrain_to_crumble_to = 137;
begindefineterrain 37; 
	import = 5;
	te_which_icon = 33;
	te_ed_which_icon = 43;
	te_crumble_type = 1;
	te_terrain_to_crumble_to = 137;

// Now for all walls, type 2.
// These are the same as wall 1 as far as this script is concerned. All differences
// in appearance are handled in the game code. The only thing that needs changing is
// the graphic used in the editor.
begindefineterrain 38; 
	import = 2;
	te_ed_which_icon = 50;
begindefineterrain 39; 
	import = 3;
	te_ed_which_icon = 51;
begindefineterrain 40; 
	import = 4;
	te_ed_which_icon = 52;
begindefineterrain 41; 
	import = 5;
	te_ed_which_icon = 53;
begindefineterrain 42; 
	import = 6;
	te_ed_which_icon = 54;
begindefineterrain 43; 
	import = 7;
	te_ed_which_icon = 55;
begindefineterrain 44; 
	import = 8;
	te_ed_which_icon = 56;
begindefineterrain 45; 
	import = 9;
	te_ed_which_icon = 57;

begindefineterrain 46; // closed doors
	import = 10;
	te_ed_which_icon = 60;
	te_swap_terrain = 50;
begindefineterrain 47; 
	import = 11;
	te_ed_which_icon = 61;
	te_swap_terrain = 51;
begindefineterrain 48; 
	import = 12;
	te_ed_which_icon = 62;
	te_swap_terrain = 52;
begindefineterrain 49; 
	import = 13;
	te_ed_which_icon = 63;	
	te_swap_terrain = 53;
begindefineterrain 50; // open doors
	import = 14;
	te_ed_which_icon = 64;
	te_swap_terrain = 46;
begindefineterrain 51; 
	import = 15;
	te_ed_which_icon = 65;
	te_swap_terrain = 47;
begindefineterrain 52; 
	import = 16;
	te_ed_which_icon = 66;
	te_swap_terrain = 48;
begindefineterrain 53; 
	import = 17;
	te_ed_which_icon = 67;	
	te_swap_terrain = 49;

begindefineterrain 54; 
	import = 18;
	te_ed_which_icon = 70;
begindefineterrain 55; 
	import = 19;
	te_ed_which_icon = 71;
begindefineterrain 56; 
	import = 20;
	te_ed_which_icon = 72;
begindefineterrain 57; 
	import = 21;
	te_ed_which_icon = 73;	
begindefineterrain 58; 
	import = 22;
	te_ed_which_icon = 74;
begindefineterrain 59; 
	import = 23;
	te_ed_which_icon = 75;
begindefineterrain 60; 
	import = 24;
	te_ed_which_icon = 76;
begindefineterrain 61; 
	import = 25;
	te_ed_which_icon = 77;	

begindefineterrain 62; 
	import = 26;
	te_ed_which_icon = 80;	
	te_swap_terrain = 66;
begindefineterrain 63; 
	import = 27;
	te_ed_which_icon = 81;	
	te_swap_terrain = 67;
begindefineterrain 64; 
	import = 28;
	te_ed_which_icon = 82;	
	te_swap_terrain = 68;
begindefineterrain 65; 
	import = 29;
	te_ed_which_icon = 83;	
	te_swap_terrain = 69;
begindefineterrain 66; 
	import = 30;
	te_ed_which_icon = 84;	
	te_swap_terrain = 62;
begindefineterrain 67; 
	import = 31;
	te_ed_which_icon = 85;	
	te_swap_terrain = 63;
begindefineterrain 68; 
	import = 32;
	te_ed_which_icon = 86;	
	te_swap_terrain = 64;
begindefineterrain 69; 
	import = 33;
	te_ed_which_icon = 87;	
	te_swap_terrain = 65;

begindefineterrain 70; 
	import = 34;
	te_ed_which_icon = 90;	
begindefineterrain 71; 
	import = 35;
	te_ed_which_icon = 91;	
begindefineterrain 72; 
	import = 36;
	te_ed_which_icon = 92;	
begindefineterrain 73; 
	import = 37;
	te_ed_which_icon = 93;	

// All hills
begindefineterrain 74; // grass hills
	clear;
	te_name = "Hill";
	te_which_sheet = 784;
	te_which_icon = 0;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 688;
	te_ed_which_icon = 40;
	te_height_adj_pixels = 12;
	te_special_property = 19;
	te_draw_on_automap = 1;
	te_suppress_floor = 1;
	te_out_fight_town_used = 1011;
begindefineterrain 75; 
	te_which_icon = 1;
	te_ed_which_icon = 41;
	te_special_property = 20;
begindefineterrain 76; 
	te_which_icon = 2;
	te_ed_which_icon = 42;
	te_special_property = 21;
begindefineterrain 77; 
	te_which_icon = 3;
	te_ed_which_icon = 43;
	te_special_property = 22;
begindefineterrain 78;

	te_ed_which_icon = 44;
	te_special_property = 23;

	te_special_property = 26;

	te_special_property = 25;
begindefineterrain 119;

	te_special_property = 19;

	te_ed_which_icon = 15;
	te_special_property = 23;	
	
// A bunch of mixed nature things (boulders, etc.)
begindefineterrain 125;
	// This is imported for a number of items that fill the terrain 
	// but can be seen through, and are drawn on autmap
	clear;
	te_name = "Boulder";
	te_which_sheet = 713;
	te_which_icon = 8;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 681;
	te_ed_which_icon = 38;
	te_draw_on_automap = 1;
	te_full_move_block = 1;
begindefineterrain 126;
	te_which_icon = 9;
	te_ed_which_icon = 39;

// The bulk of the terrain types that cling to/hang off the north/west walls.
begindefineterrain 178; // first north wall hanging
// These first two are imported for the ones that need to be 
// offset to be drawn against the wall.

	te_name = "Wall Hanging";
	te_which_sheet = 742;
	te_which_icon = 1;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 683;
	te_ed_which_icon = 99;

// 4 curtains. you can walk through these but they block sight
begindefineterrain 370;
	clear;
	te_name = "Curtain";
	te_which_sheet = 742;
	te_which_icon = 1;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 687;
	te_ed_which_icon = 0;
	te_icon_offset_x = 18;

	te_icon_offset_x = 0;
	te_icon_offset_y = -6;
	te_look_block_n = 0;
	te_look_block_s = 1;
begindefineterrain 371;
	clear;
	te_name = "Curtain";
	te_which_sheet = 749;
	te_which_icon = 9;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 687;
	te_ed_which_icon = 1;
	te_icon_offset_x = -18;
	te_icon_offset_y = -18;
	te_look_block_w = 1;

	te_icon_offset_x = 0;
	te_icon_offset_y = -6;
	te_look_block_w = 0;
	te_look_block_e = 1;

begindefineterrain 376;

	te_name = "Runed Platform";
	te_which_sheet = 767;
	te_which_icon = 9;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 686;
	te_ed_which_icon = 79;
	
// Beam terrains. These are the terrains that project beams. Remember that prjectors
// don't send out beams unless you set the proper value in the town details window.
begindefineterrain 380;
	import = 125;
	te_name = "Beam Projector";
	te_which_sheet = 790;
	te_which_icon = 2;
	te_ed_which_sheet = 689;
	te_ed_which_icon = 2;	
	te_special_property = 32;
	te_beam_hit_type = 3;
	te_terrain_to_crumble_to = 389;
begindefineterrain 381;
	te_which_icon = 1;
	te_ed_which_icon = 1;	
	te_special_property = 33;
begindefineterrain 382;
	te_which_icon = 0;
	te_ed_which_icon = 0;	
	te_special_property = 34;
begindefineterrain 383;
	te_which_icon = 3;
	te_ed_which_icon = 3;	
	te_special_property = 35;

	te_name = "Energy Source";
	te_which_icon = 8;
	te_ed_which_icon = 8;	
	te_special_property = 38;
	te_beam_hit_type = 0;

	te_which_icon = 23;
	te_ed_which_icon = 23;

	te_beam_hit_type = 1;

// ITEM TYPES

// A Blades of Avernum scenario can have up to 500 item types.



begindefineitem 0;
// empty item data
	clear;

// begin coins
begindefineitem 1;
	it_name = "Coins";
	it_full_name = "Copper Coins";
	it_variety = 3;
	it_charges = 6;
	it_floor_which_sheet = 1000;
	it_floor_which_icon = 1;
	it_inventory_icon = 1;
begindefineitem 2;
	it_full_name = "Silver Coins";
	it_charges = 15;
	it_floor_which_icon = 2;
	it_inventory_icon = 2;
begindefineitem 3;
	it_full_name = "Gold Coins";
	it_charges = 40;
	it_floor_which_icon = 3;
	it_inventory_icon = 3;

// begin food 
// these are all always identified, so only ever need identified names
begindefineitem 4;
	clear;
	it_full_name = "Bread";
	it_variety = 4;
	it_charges = 1;
	it_floor_which_sheet = 1000;
	it_floor_which_icon = 4;
	it_inventory_icon = 4;
	it_value = 4;
	it_weight = 10;
	it_identified = 1;

// now do pole weapons
begindefineitem 64;
	clear;
	it_name = "Spear";
	it_full_name = "Cursed Spear";
	it_variety = 1;
	it_damage_per_level = 5;
	it_weapon_skill_used = 5;
	it_floor_which_sheet = 1004;
	it_floor_which_icon = 9;

begindefineitem 464;
begindefineitem 465;
begindefineitem 466;

// Some items in Blades of Exile have abilities that don't work in the new engine. Those items
// are turned to this item. Do not alter this item ... items of type 499 never appear 
// in the game.
begindefineitem 499;
	clear;	
	it_full_name = "Nontranslatable Item";
